hymn.title: Remember your Creator while you are young

layout.singingstanza: Re -- mem -- ber your Cre -- a -- tor While you are young, As a child, know the Scrip -- tures And seek out God's truth. Re -- mem -- ber your Cre -- a -- tor While you are young, Let Him have a way In the days of your youth.

lyrics.stanza: Remember your Creator While you are young, As a child, know the Scriptures And seek out God's truth. Remember your Creator While you are young, Let Him have a way In the days of your youth.
Remember your Creator While you are young. To remember our Creator Means to love Him. The Lord is the Creator, Our source of life. In the days of our youth We would love only Him.
